tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP swear) (SBAR (S (NP (NP (RB almost) (DT all)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN guy) (NNS friends)))) (VP (VBP are) (ADJP (JJ bad) (SBAR (S (NP (NNS things)) (VP (VBP !!!)))))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [swear/VBP nsubj>I/PRP ccomp>[bad/JJ nsubj>[all/DT advmod>almost/RB nmod:of>[friends/NNS case>of/IN nmod:poss>my/PRP$ compound>guy/NN]] cop>are/VBP ccomp>[!!!/VBP nsubj>things/NNS]]]
